    Can you crack it? it isn't a one time pad!
    

For number 2, 10jcwhitw says:

    Lets see if you can do this one a rather weird cipher I think but again it may be able to be solved as another cipher.

    'abaaaeadacagafajaiahbbbabebdbcbgbfbjbibhcbcacecdccxxxfc'
